txt.en: 'The Orkish commander of Tharbad still resides within that tower. With the courtyard clear, you should now be able to make your assault upon the tower itself.'
Return to Hithriel and tell them of the commander's defeat
With the defeat of the Orc commander of Tharbad, you should return to the mission giver.

'Well fought [placeholder]. With the defeat of the Orkish commander, the forces scattered throughout the ruins will be leaderless and in chaos.\n\n'Dealing with them will be much simpler now. I thank you.'
'Well [placeholder], are you prepared to begin your ascent of the Tower?'
Speak with the mission giver and let them know that you are ready to investigate the tower.
There is no twist in this mission.
Complete the Mission: Tharbad Tower Ascent
The Commander of the Orkish forces of Tharbad watches over the city from within the old tower upon the river. Ascend the tower and defeat him.
